tool_description: The Google People Also Ask API is a powerful tool that allows developers to access the "People Also Ask" feature from Google search results. This API enables you to retrieve the additional questions that appear in Google's search results, providing valuable insights into related queries and user search behavior.
name: Google People Also Ask API
title: Google People Also Ask API

api_list.name: Get Question and Answer
Get Question

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The field must be filled with the searched word.
